member.name: T:System.Reactive.Linq.RemotingObservable
member.summary: Provides a set of static methods for exposing observable sequences through .NET Remoting.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Linq.RemotingObservable.Remotable``1(System.IObservable{``0})
member.summary: Makes an observable sequence remotable, using an infinite lease for the wrapping the source.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements in the source sequence.
member.returns: The observable sequence that supports remote subscriptions.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Linq.RemotingObservable.Remotable``1(System.IObservable{``0},System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease)
member.summary: Makes an observable sequence remotable, using a controllable lease for the wrapping the source.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements in the source sequence.
member.param: Lease object to control lifetime of the remotable sequence. Notice null is a supported value.
member.returns: The observable sequence that supports remote subscriptions.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Linq.RemotingObservable.Remotable``1(System.Reactive.Linq.IQbservable{``0})
member.summary: Makes an observable sequence remotable, using an infinite lease for the wrapping the source.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements in the source sequence.
member.returns: The observable sequence that supports remote subscriptions.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Linq.RemotingObservable.Remotable``1(System.Reactive.Linq.IQbservable{``0},System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease)
member.summary: Makes an observable sequence remotable, using a controllable lease for the wrapping the source.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements in the source sequence.
member.param: Lease object to control lifetime of the remotable sequence. Notice null is a supported value.
member.returns: The observable sequence that supports remote subscriptions.
